name: LOST - a rescue mission
description:
Hi All, My submission for game-jam 48hr (BYOG) themes is Minimal interaction and Reset. For first-time play, this game takes a bit of time(3-5)min to load into the browser as it has special effects and 3d elements.

Please have patience and give it a try & don't forget to drop a comment on it.

Thanks
GameGrid

============================================================
How to Play?
Use Keyboard (Left-Right-Up-Down)Keys to move the Player.

Story:
We lost contact with Ethan!

He was on a secret mission carrying nuke energy batteries!

As our last information, his ship got damaged and is now stuck somewhere in space, planet Unknown! Your mission is to collect all the batteries and rescue Ethan! You have limited-20sec time access. Otherwise, will be stuck in time.

Do your best! Soldier. 

Good luck!
